frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG asset containing a teal circular Whisper logo with stylized white markings.

frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Rounded icon container with size and color variants.

State selector loading all states and supporting disabled and error states.

Task management UI allowing creation and status updates of tasks tied to a proposal, with loading and error handling.

Main proposals list with loading, error, refresh, and navigation handling, opening proposal detail dialogs.

Searchable typeahead component filtering and selecting location options with keyboard navigation.

Custom hook syncing React state with localStorage while handling SSR safety and JSON parsing.

frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point bootstrapping React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.

frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Static page rendering geography placeholder content with header, back navigation, and styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page allowing authenticated users to view and edit their name and avatar with upload, preview, and save logic.

frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across normal and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps unknown or technical errors into safe user-facing messages while logging the original error.
